basics.name: Victor Pagan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

highlights: Service and manage several restaurant customers simultaneously
Work and communicate with other staff to ensure efficient workflow
Adapt to different positions in the restaurant where necessary

volunteer.organization: Robotics and Space Exploration (RoSE) at UH Manoa
volunteer.position: Guidance and Navigation Control Team Developer
volunteer.summary: Front-end developer for the ground station subteam
highlights: Built up the ground station website through collaboration with other team members
Developed a control webpage making use of a controller to connect to the robot through ROS

volunteer.organization: Programming and Algorithms Club (PANDA) at UH Manoa
highlights: Student-led learning and tutoring groups for ICS majors
Cover weekly rotating computer science topics relating to algorithms and data structures in detail

volunteer.organization: Game Dev Club at UH Manoa
highlights: Developed game projects with other students in one large group
Worked with artists and writers through implementing their work into a developed product
Created using game engines such as Unity and Ren'py with unfamiliar coding languages

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
